title: Bug 122687Libraries dont appear to allow background colors on tables to be used
OB: Bug 122687Libraries dont appear to allow background colors on tables to be used If I create a table and set the background color to blue in my library and then drag the table from the library to the report the background color does not go with it.
SR: If I create a table and set the background color to blue in my library and then drag the table from the library to the report the background color does not go with it.
